title: Powder Keg
description: Portable exploding barrels! Drop them from your inventory to pick them up to place or throw them. Can be exploded with the Slingshot.
location: Can be found in chests around Hyrule.

title: Portable Paraglider
description: A portable paraglider that can be dropped from your inventory, when you pick them up you can jump off a cliff and glide.
location: Can be found in chests around Hyrule.

title: Heart Piece
description: Can be exchanged 5 at a time with the goddess statues around Hyrule for more health.
location: Can be found in chests around Hyrule.

title: Estus Flask
description: Fills a portion of your Yellow Stamina Wheel, allowing the Lost One (you) to regenerate Stamina.
location: Can be gained by resting at a campfire after recivieving the Divine Vessel from the Old Man.

title: Balloon
description: These balloons act like Octo Balloons, but these don't pop! Make your flying dreams come true.
location: Can be found in chests around Hyrule.

title: Cracked Pot (Fire)
description: A bomb that explodes with fire, burning nearby enemies.
location: Can be crafted at the alchemy tables found in towns and the Shrine of Resurrection.

title: Cracked Pot (Water)
description: A bomb that explodes with water, wetting nearby enemies.
location: Can be crafted at the alchemy tables found in towns and the Shrine of Resurrection.

title: Cracked Pot (Ice)
description: A bomb that explodes with ice, freezing nearby enemies.
location: Can be crafted at the alchemy tables found in towns and the Shrine of Resurrection.

title: Cracked Pot (Earth)
location: Can be crafted at the alchemy tables found in towns and the Shrine of Resurrection.

title: Cracked Pot (Air)
description: A bomb that explodes with a large gust of wind, knocking back and damaging nearby enemies.
location: Can be crafted at the alchemy tables found in towns and the Chapel of Resurrection.

title: Cracked Pot (Shock)
description: A bomb that explodes and shoots balls of electricity all around, shocking and stunning nearby enemies.
location: Can be crafted at the alchemy tables found in towns and the Chapel of Resurrection.

title: Cracked Pot (Metal)
description: A bomb that explodes and sends giant spiked balls flying, dealing massive damage to nearby enemies (and you).
location: Can be crafted at the alchemy tables found in towns and the Chapel of Resurrection.

title: Cracked Pot (Holy)
location: Can be crafted at the alchemy tables found in towns and the Chapel of Resurrection.

title: Cracked Pot (Dark)
location: Can be crafted at the alchemy tables found in towns and the Chapel of Resurrection.

title: Cracked Pot (Wood)
location: Can be crafted at the alchemy tables found in towns and the Chapel of Resurrection.
